texto-traducido: On 10/17/2003 I assumed the Presidency in the midst of a state crisis. In my government we pacified and stabilized the country, we convened the Constituent Assembly, we initiated autonomy, we held the gas referendum and we respect human rights. I complied with Bolivia. I would do it again
texto-original: El 17/10 de 2003 asumí la Presidencia en medio de una crisis de Estado. En mi gobierno pacificamos y estabilizamos al país, convocamos a la Asamblea Constituyente, iniciamos la autonomía, hicimos el referéndum del gas y respetamos los DDHH. Cumplí con Bolivia. lo haría de nuevo

texto-traducido: Yesterday, 10/16, the Citizen Community elected its directives and representations in the ALP for the 2023 management. I salute the renewal, gender equity and diversity, but above all the commitment and decision of those who will assume such important responsibilities.
texto-original: Ayer 16/10 Comunidad Ciudadana eligió a sus directivas y representaciones en la ALP para la gestión 2023. Saludo la renovación, equidad de género y diversidad, pero sobre todo el compromiso y decisión de quienes asumirán tan importantes responsabilidades.

texto-traducido: It raises the cost of food and increases violence in homes; conflicts are increasing and justice continues to worsen. Meanwhile the government is consumed with partisan fights, growing corruption, confrontation with Santa Cruz and more misleading propaganda. we go wrong

texto-traducido: The government assured that the Census would be in 2022 and now it says that it cannot even be in 2023. It lied about the false coup, judicial reform, conspiracies, the urea plant, food inflation and the sea of gas. Morales' fraud and deception are repeated once MORE

texto-traducido: The council is a constitutional mechanism of participatory democracy that expresses the feelings of the citizenry, and its mandates must be respected. My full support for the Cabildo of Santa Cruz for the 2023 census and my support for its resolutions.

texto-traducido: The OAS Report -requested by Morales and which demonstrated the monumental fraud of 2019- which was already supported by the EU, today is supported by the US. texto-traducido: The death of Eduardo Trigo O. is a huge loss. His life was a testimony of commitment to Tarija and the country. His intellectual contribution enriched the knowledge of our common past.

texto-traducido: The Condor of the Andes for Matilde Casazola Mendoza not only recognizes her prolific and outstanding cultural work, but also dignifies her as one of the most notable Bolivian women of today. I proudly join the country's tribute to this great artist.
texto-original: El Cóndor de los Andes para Matilde Casazola Mendoza no solo reconoce su prolífica y sobresaliente obra cultural, sino que la dignifica como una de las bolivianas más notables de hoy. Me sumo con orgullo al homenaje del país a esta gran artista.

texto-traducido: The death of Queen Elizabeth Il takes 70 years of European history. It was a model of vocation of respect for British democracy, expressed in its system of parliamentary monarchy. His reign has been an example of sobriety, serenity and a fundamental pillar of the United Kingdom.
texto-original: La muerte de la reina Isabel Il se lleva 70 años de historia europea. Fue modelo de vocación de respeto a la democracia británica, expresada en su sistema de monarquía parlamentaria. Su reinado ha sido un ejemplo de sobriedad, serenidad y pilar fundamental del Reino Unido.

texto-traducido: I salute the democratic and peaceful participation of the Chilean people who clearly expressed their decision regarding the proposed constitutional change. Respect for the popular will expressed in the referendum is the most dignified way of exercising sovereignty.
texto-original: Saludo la participación democrática y pacífica del pueblo chileno que con toda claridad expresó su decisión respecto a la propuesta de cambio Constitucional. El respeto a la voluntad popular expresada en el referéndum es la forma más digna de ejercer la soberanía.

texto-traducido: express my personal solidarity with Zvonko Matkovic, businessman and politician from Santa Cruz, victim of the disgraceful justice system, which persecutes and imprisons opponents and undermines and protects masistas who commit electoral fraud, subjugate properties and systematically violate human rights.
texto-original: Expreso mi solidaridad personal a Zvonko Matkovic, empresario y político cruceño víctima del oprobioso sistema de justicia, que persigue y encarcela a opositores y socapa y protege a los masistas que cometen fraude electoral, avasallan propiedades y violan sistemáticamente DDHH

texto-traducido: In its 197 years of existence, I pay tribute to the greatness and courage of those who bequeathed us a free, independent, and sovereign Homeland, and to the Bolivian men and women from all corners of the country, who today build it with work, hope, and unity. #VivaBolivia https://t.co/7aO1MPYeKi

texto-traducido: The sentence for the #Chaparina case tries to guarantee impunity for Morales and Llorenti, responsible for the racist repression against the indigenous people of the lowlands in 2011. A new unworthy act of the justice operators under the orders of the #Fugitive Dictator

texto-traducido: The completion of the Census and the total reform of the judicial system are the most important goals for Bolivian democracy in 2023. The fight for the government to guarantee that both processes are carried out without delay, without fraud and without exclusions, is an imperative for all.

texto-traducido: As in dictatorships, the MAS government manipulates the facts and uses public employees to persecute opponents and imprison protesting citizens. The violent excesses of the State are the strategy of autocrats. https://t.co/Yb8uFDNSom
